titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of "National Nonviolence Week" to raise awareness of youth violence in the United States.
Supporting the goals and ideals of "National Nonviolence Week" to raise awareness of youth violence in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Expresses support for "National Nonviolence Week" to raise awareness of youth violence and encourages government officials, schools, law enforcement agencies, and other interested groups to observe the week with appropriate programs and activities.
